title: Canadians Are Having Crypto Stolen From Their Homes, Police Say
description: Authorities believe there may be a connection between several robberies that have occurred in Canada involving thieves searching for private keys linked to crypto funds.

title: Crypto Funds Linked to Fentanyl Trade Come Mostly From Centralized Exchanges: Elliptic
description: Blockchain analytics firm Elliptic found that most crypto funds used in the fentanyl trade can be traced to centralized exchanges.

title: 'Mighty Action Heroes' Puts a Fun Battle Royale Shooter in Your Browser
description: PREVIEW: Fast-paced battle royale game Mighty Action Heroes doesn't break new ground, but it offers up fun moments in its open beta.

title: Federal Reserve Launches Fednow for Instant Payments — JPMorgan, Wells Fargo, and 33 Banks Onboard
description: The Federal Reserve has launched its Fednow Service for instant payments with 35 participating banks and credit unions, as well as 16 service providers. “The Federal Reserve is committed to working with the more than 9,000 banks and credit unions across the country to support the widespread availability of this service for their customers over […]

title: House Republicans propose crypto regulatory framework
description: The dawn of an epoch-making legislation aimed at putting the fast-paced crypto sector under a regulatory microscope is upon us, with US lawmakers putting forward the Financial Innovation and Technology for the 21st Century Act. Advocating for a rigorous structure to guard consumers, stimulate ingenuity, and secure America’s dominance in financial and technological sectors, this ... Read more
